INPUT.SEARCH_STRING_TOOLTIP: Use special characters for specialized searches: & for AND, | for OR, ! for NOT, (...) to group terms, and "..." for exact phrases. Example: (dog | "white mice") & !cat
INPUT.SCOPE_TOOLTIP: Search scope: 'Paragraph' will consider your search criteria within the entire paragraph, while 'Sentence' will narrow the criteria to individual sentences.
